stories.text: Has anyone made a GitHub list yet for Russian (or Russian funded) software and/or SaaS services that one can/should boycott? It's difficult for simple folk like me to determine the actual beneficiaries of companies nowadays. From the tech sector I'm in, I've heard on Acronis, CloudLinux, Parallels, Virtuozzo and OnApp being Russian funded.
stories.title: Ask HN: Lists of Russian Software to Boycott?
U.S., allies agree oil reserves release as oil prices soar
Learning Linux kernel exploitation – Part 1 – Laying the groundwork
Study: Pfizer RNA can be reverse-transcribed and integrated into human liver DNA

stories.text:
Hello HN,

I was wondering if any of the start-ups that we are looking at have Russian stockholders or whether they have accepted funds that are indirectly sourced from Russia or through the various oligarchs.

If so, do you have plans on dealing with this or will you wait until the government acts, and if so what kind of action do you anticipate?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you have Russian stockholders?
